author: Special Correspondent
text:
Former Union Minister M.K. Alagiri met his father and DMK president M. Karunanidhi here on Thursday, a meeting that was termed as non-political by his younger brother M.K. Stalin.

Removed from the DMK for “anti-party activities”, Mr. Alagiri has been making critical comments about Mr. Stalin and his election campaign. Mr. Alagiri arrived at Mr. Karunanidhi’s residence at 11 a.m. and spent about half an hour. Later, he said he came to enquire about his father’s health and met his mother Dayalu Ammal.
title: Alagiri meets Karunanidhi
